notes.text:
Use homemade stock for best results
Don't overcook the noodles
Add lemon juice for brightness

steps.descr: Bring stock to boil, add chicken and cook for 20 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by bringing the stock to a boil. Once it's bubbling away, add in the chicken breasts. We'll let them cook for 20 minutes. You'll know it's ready when the chicken is tender and cooked through.

steps.instructions: Bring stock to boil, add chicken and cook for 20 minutes

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now let's carefully remove the chicken from the pot. Once it's cool enough to handle, shred it into lovely bite-sized pieces.

steps.descr: Add vegetables to stock, simmer for 10 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's add those lovely vegetables to the stock. Give it a good stir and let it simmer gently for 10 minutes. The aroma will be fantastic!

steps.instructions: Add vegetables to stock, simmer for 10 minutes

steps.descr: Add noodles and cook until tender

on_enter.say: Time to add the noodles! Stir them in and cook until they're tender. Keep an eye on them so they don't overcook.

steps.instructions: Add noodles and cook until tender

on_enter.say: Let's return the shredded chicken to the pot. Give it a good stir to mix everything together beautifully.

steps.descr: Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley

on_enter.say: Now, let's season our soup with a pinch of salt, a dash of pepper, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley. Taste and adjust as needed.

steps.instructions: Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley

on_enter.say: Fantastic! It's time to serve up this delicious chicken noodle soup. Enjoy it hot with a slice of crusty bread. Bon app√©tit!

recipe.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipe.description: Comforting classic soup with tender chicken and egg noodles
